scene_description_enriched: Two male figures, both with halos indicating sainthood, are depicted. The figure on the left wears a blue robe over a yellow tunic and holds a closed book. The figure on the right wears a red robe over a yellow tunic and holds an open book. Both figures have beards and appear to be engaged in discussion or contemplation of the texts. The background is a dark, textured surface, possibly representing a wall or a simple interior space. The scene is framed by a red border with gold ornamentation.
